title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin pushes back against Aaron Rodgers getting handed the MVP this season when there are clearly 2 other quarterbacks who have had better seasons. He believes LeBron James has separated himself from other all time great basketball players despite the Lakers having a down season. He uses Derek Carr as the perfect example to show the value of a good quarterback in today's NFL. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to break down each of the quarterbacks heading into Wild Card weekend. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
